item.title: “Ella Baila Sola” by Eslabon Armado & Peso Pluma returns to #1 on global Spotify with over 7.515 million streams.

item.title: Taylor Swift becomes the first female artist to have six albums with over 3 billion streams on Spotify.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
‘Red (Taylor’s Version)’ by @TaylorSwift13 has reached 3 BILLION streams on Spotify.
It’s her 6th album to achieve this.
